name: Lock simulator
description:
TIP : use fullscreen for better use !

UPDATE ! (1.2 : Moar themes)

-Added more themes ! Press right arrow to change them (By 4buns! Thanks to him!)

-Added a sound when switching themes

-More songs to discover !

Controls (/!\ ON THE KEYPAD):

Up - Play a song

Down - Stop the song

0-Spacebar : CountIn

1-B : Onbeat march

2-N : Offbeat march

4-G : From On to Off - 1 (hai)

5-H : From On to Off - 2 (ah)

6-J : From On to Off - 3 (hoi)

7-T : Boh

8-Y : From Off to On - 1 (hee)

9-U : From Off to on - 2 (haa)

Cue guide: (x,x = One beat *** x/x a half beat)

From On to Off : 4,4,4,5/6,7,7,7,7

From Off to On : 8/9/8/9/4
